original_text: You are standing here to agree to the covenant that the Lord your God is making with you today. You must promise to obey it.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와의 언약에 참여하며 또 네 하나님 여호와께서 오늘 네게 하시는 맹세에 참여하여

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is making with you today
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 오늘 너희와 맺으시는

sentences.original_text: You must promise to obey it
